response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just any commodity; it represents a significant milestone in my journey and has the potential to enrich your life in ways that are yet to be discovered by us both.

I am extending to you an exclusive offer to purchase this product at a price of $500,000. I believe this is a fair and reasonable price considering the rarity and the profound significance of the item. It is my hope that you will see its true worth and appreciate the opportunity to own such a valuable piece.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you require more information about the product. I am more than happy to provide any details you might need to make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 500000}
